titles.title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Education and Labor in the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress.
Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Education and Labor in the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

bill.summary: This resolution provides amounts for the expenses of the House Committee on Education and Labor for the 117th Congress.
